reviews.review: Professor Harris is a very kind and understanding professor. If you have the opportunity please take him as it's almost a guaranteed A. Just put in the work, the first few speaking assignments are annoying but weren't too bad. The final project seems intimidating but you can do it as a group and knock it out in less than a day. He is very forgiving and as long as you show some type of effort he will give you an A.

You don't have to go to all of his classes. I went about once a week. Just follow the directions and you will get an A. He is a very nice guy, but sometimes his directions are unclear. He is very understanding and has done a lot in his life. Very hard to get an A+ but very easy to get an A.

Very easy class and I would highly recommend this professor. He cares about his students and genuinely wants to know more about them. The class is easy with a few assignments that aren't graded very hard. Attendance also isn't mandatory and he doesn't really mind when assignments aren't turned in on time. Fairly hard to get an A+ in the class but if you do all the work and put effort in an A will be very easy.
